setAuthentication(String, int, String, String) - Method in class agilermi.RmiRegistry
Adds authentication details for a remote host
setAuthenticator(Authenticator) - Method in class agilermi.RmiRegistry.Builder
Set an Authenticator object that intercept authentication and authorization requests from remote machines.
setDefaultAuthorization(boolean) - Method in class agilermi.StandardAuthenticator
Sets the default authorization, that is the default return value of the StandardAuthenticator.authorize(String, Object, Method) method when no criterion has been found
setFilterFactory(FilterFactory) - Method in class agilermi.RmiRegistry.Builder
Sets the FilterFactory instance to use in the registry to build.
setIdAuthorization(String, Object, Method, int) - Method in class agilermi.StandardAuthenticator
Set object-method couple authorization for a user

setIdAuthorization(String, Object, int) - Method in class agilermi.StandardAuthenticator

setIdAuthorization(String, Class<?>, int) - Method in class agilermi.StandardAuthenticator
Set class couple authorization for a user
setMultiConnectionMode(boolean) - Method in class agilermi.RmiRegistry
Enable or disable multi-connection mode.
setRoleAuthorization(String, Object, Method, int) - Method in class agilermi.StandardAuthenticator

setRoleAuthorization(String, Method, int) - Method in class agilermi.StandardAuthenticator

setRoleAuthorization(String, Class<?>, int) - Method in class agilermi.StandardAuthenticator

setSocketFactories(SocketFactory, ServerSocketFactory) - Method in class agilermi.RmiRegistry.Builder
Sets the socket factories that the registry will use.
StandardAuthenticator - Class in agilermi
Standard authenticator implementation that maintain authentication information in central memory.
